replies.author: Mars_xiaokai
replies.txt_content:
/res pset XXX move t
res pset XXX build t
res pset XXX use t
res pset XXX container t
或者
/res set move t
res set build t
res set use t
res set container t

set是给全部人权限，pset是给个人权限！

replies.author: fyy1214816151
replies.txt_content:
Mars_xiaokai 发表于 2013-6-10 10:20:13 
/res pset XXX move t
res pset XXX build t
res pset XXX use t
res pset XXX container t
或者
/res s
谢了，等我用电脑上网给你
